name: Bump and Run Racing
description:
Ever miss the good ole' days where you could smash your way to the finish line? Well look no further! "Bump & Run Racing" is a re-imagination of classic arcade racers that center gameplay around the destruction of your fellow racers. Earn and burn boost, take down opponents and avoid those pesky pedestrians on your way to the finish line.

Current Gameplay Features:


    5 Game Modes;
  • Circuit
  • Sprint
  • Road Rage
  • Eliminator
  • Hot Pursuit

    "Crash Party":
  • 2-4 players go head to head in turn based takedown competition

    Additional Features:
  • 4 unique tracks (Day and Night)
  • 12 total vehicles
  • A nitrous system that encourages carnage
  • Online leaderboard to compare your stats and records with friends
  • Cloud saves to transfer seamlessly between devices
